body.data:
INSERT INTO WINDOW.INTERCORRENCIA_PEDIDOS 
(
    ID_FILIAL,
    NOME_MOTOBOY,
    COD_MOTOBOY,
    DATA_INTERCORRENCIA,
    CIDADE,
    SAIDA_ID,
    NUMPED,
    TEMPO_INTERCORRENCIA,
    DESCRICAO,
    NOME_LANCAMENTO,
    CODWINTHOR_LANCAMENTO,
    URLS_FOTOS,
	  ID_CATEGORIA_INTERCORRENCIA,
	  CATEGORIA_INTERCORRENCIA
)
VALUES
(
    {{ (lancar_intecoreencias.data.filter(i => i.NUMPED == Select_pedido.selectedOptionValue)[0])?.CODFILIAL }},
    '{{ (lancar_intecoreencias.data.filter(i => i.NUMPED == Select_pedido.selectedOptionValue)[0])?.NOME.trim() }}',
    {{ (lancar_intecoreencias.data.filter(i => i.NUMPED == Select_pedido.selectedOptionValue)[0])?.CODMOTORISTA }},
    SYSDATE,
    '{{ (lancar_intecoreencias.data.filter(i => i.NUMPED == Select_pedido.selectedOptionValue)[0])?.SIGLA }}',
    {{ (lancar_intecoreencias.data.filter(i => i.NUMPED == Select_pedido.selectedOptionValue)[0])?.SAIDAID }},
    {{ (lancar_intecoreencias.data.filter(i => i.NUMPED == Select_pedido.selectedOptionValue)[0])?.NUMPED }},

    TO_DSINTERVAL(
      'PT' ||
      TO_CHAR(TO_TIMESTAMP_TZ('{{ DatePicker2.selectedDate }}', 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS.FF3"Z"'), 'MI') || 'M' ||
      TO_CHAR(TO_TIMESTAMP_TZ('{{ DatePicker2.selectedDate }}', 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS.FF3"Z"'), 'SS') || 'S'
    ),

    '{{ Input_DESCRICAO.text }}',
    '{{ appsmith.store.usuario_nome }}',
    '{{ appsmith.store.matricula }}',
    '{{ foto_intercorrencia.data.secure_url }}',
    '{{Select_categoria.selectedOptionValue}}',
	  '{{Select_categoria.selectedOptionLabel}}'
	
	
	
);
